Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews

Class GUIGameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews.GUIView
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.GUI.GUIViews.GUIGameView
public class GUIGameView extends GUIView
The GUIGameView class represents the Graphical User Interface (GUI) view for displaying the game and all the details composing the game board.

This class handles the rendering of various game elements including player stats, cards, decks, opponent fields, and the player's own field.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected boolean
    shouldReset
    The boolean value indicating whether the content of the gameScreen and its panes should be completely reset because it might have become inconsistent with the data inside the viewModel.

    Method
    Description
    void
    awaitingScreen()
    Signals to the user with a popup that he is the only remaining player connected to the game, and that the game is currently paused due to disconnections.

    Shows all the game elements composing the game board and illustrating the information related to the game.

    Shows the leaderboard at the end of the game in a new popup, containing player rankings and points.

    void
    showField(ClientPlayer player)
    Renders the field of a given player in a new popup that zooms it to make it more visible.
    void
    showHand()
    Shows the player's hand (front sides by default, but toggleable) at the bottom of the screen.
    void
    showInitialCardsChoice()
    Renders the popup containing the two sides of the assigned initial card for the user to choose from.
    void
    showObjectiveCardsChoice(ArrayList<ClientCard> objectivesSelection)
    Renders the popup containing the two secret objective cards received for the user to choose from.
    void
    updateChat()
    Updates the chat pane with the new log messages, also adding the timestamp indicating when the message has been received.
